chapters.summary: Some of this story is true. All of it is magic. In some cases I have compressed events in others I have made two people into one. The words here represent the true feelings and lessons I learned from a teacher I never knew I needed.
chapters.headline: My memoir is a work of creative storytelling

chapters.summary: How I Lost My Religion, Hitchhiked Away from Marriage, Discovered Magic, and Met the Mother. Meeting her is an opportunity to meet your maker. To learn from her loving, all knowing wisdom. When it's time to meet her, she will come to you.
chapters.headline: Former Republican Senator Steve Urquhart invites Brooke Lark to try ayahuasca
chapters.gist: The Invitation to Meet the Mother of Ayahuasca
